explains: n. 精神错乱，精神失常；愚蠢（或不理智）的事

sentences.en: The insanity which ran in his family haunted him.
sentences.cn: 家族世代相袭的精神病令他惴惴不安。

sentences.en: He was charged with murder, but got off on a plea of insanity.
sentences.cn: 他被指控犯了谋杀罪，但以精神错乱为由逃过惩罚。

sentences.en: Phillips murdered his wife, but got off on a plea of insanity.
sentences.cn: 菲利普斯谋杀了自己的妻子，但以精神错乱为由逃脱了罪责。
